Introduction
This topic contains information on the preparation of awards, including
location of instructions for the preparation of awards
instructions for the preparation of awards under 38 U.S.C. 1151 with an offset
, and
entitlement to ancillary benefits if compensation is awarded for a disability under 38 U.S.C. 1151
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 6, Section C - Authorization of Awards Under 38 U.S.C. 1151
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 6, Section C
